meaning: Cannot win the competition / Can't handle the rat race
description: Describes a state of being stuck and unable to win in "involution" (intense social competition). Same as 卷也卷不过 (juǎn yě juǎn bù guò) and 卷不了 (juǎn bù liǎo). 卷不动了 (juǎn bù dòng le) means "Don't want to strive anymore (because I can't win)".

examples.chinese: 摆不烂,卷不赢,躺不平,现在就是个四十五度人
examples.translation: Can't rot, can't win the rat race, can't lie flat, right now I'm just a 45-degree person

examples.chinese: 每次都拿三等,真崩溃了,永远卷不赢
examples.translation: I get third place every time, I'm really breaking down, I can never win the competition

examples.chinese: 我真的不想被催被内卷,过够了这样卷又卷不赢的生活
examples.translation: I really don't want to be rushed or involved in the rat race, I've had enough of this life where I compete but can't win
